ygData.subject: Re: SV: Survey results ???? - my 2 coppers
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Case well stated. Never thought of it that way, nor even thought about those items as they are out of my reach. But for a twink, they may not be. And....
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Avron Elselynn" <avron@...>
>
>I do not suggest they should put level caps on everything, certainly not
>items made with player skills, or things you can buy in stores.. But more
>like things like rubicite, mithril eq etc.. And they HAVE put level caps on
>some eq in a way now.. Since you can't even go into fear plane below level
>46 anymore, all that eq is capped at level 46.. AND nodrop.. I just dont
>want everything to be nodrop so it hinders the trade economy, I want to be
>able to trade away my old weapon for a new one and a shitload of platina,
>when I can, instead of just putting the old weapon in the bank to rot away,
>or destroying it..
>
>- Avron Elselynn - Solusek Ro
>

Case well stated. Never thought of it that way, nor even thought about those
items as they are out of my reach. But for a twink, they may not be. And....
as in the case stated above, I agree totally. SO I guess you just changed my
mind for me.
